title: Bali
description: Discover beautiful beaches, ancient temples, lush rice terraces, and vibrant culture. Bali offers a perfect blend of spirituality, adventure, and relaxation.
climate: Bali has a tropical climate with two seasons: dry season (April-October) and wet season (November-March). The best time to visit is during the dry season when the weather is sunny and perfect for beach activities and outdoor adventures.
